text: Jungle Ki Beti is a 1988 Hindi adventure fantasy film of Bollywood, directed by R. Thakkar and produced by Anil Singh. Music director of the film was Rajesh Roshan. ==Plot== ==Cast== * Salma Agha * Rakesh Bedi * Goga Kapoor * Joginder * Kalpana Iyer * Arjun (Firoz Khan) * Mohan Choti * Brando Bakshi ==References== ==External links== * Category:1988 films Category:Indian films Category:Indian fantasy adventure films Category:Indian erotic films Category:1980s Hindi-language films
title: Jungle Ki Beti
